Cooking is Love

Cooking is one of the strongest ceremonies for life. When recipes are put together, the kitchen is a chemical laboratory involving air, fire, water and the earth. This is what gives value to humans and elevates their spiritual qualities. If you take a frozen box and stick it in the microwave, you become connected to the factory.

Laura Esquivel

Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.

Harriet Van Horne

Our Menu

Begin with a selection from our award winning beverage menu or choose a starter from our extensive starter list. Our wine list features over 100 different vintages and has received the chamber of commerce award of excellence.

Cocktails

Chocolate Martini

Tito's Vodka and White Créme de Cacao dusted with hand shaved chocolate.

$9
Summer Breeze Martini

Hendrick’s Gin, St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur and Brancot Sauvignon Blanc with a floater of Cristalino Cava Brut.

$9
Sweet Heat Margarita

Jalapeño infused tequila, triple sec, pineapple juice, orange liqueur, and lime juice.

$10
Prickly Pear

Cactus fruits, also known as "prickly pears," .New Amsterdam Vodka and Pear liquer in a sugar . Conatins tequila,lime juice

$9
Classic Martini

Seagrams Gin, Dry Vermouth, pickle juice, olive juice.

$9
Rosmerry Refresher

House infused rosemary vodka, Germaine Elderflower liqueur, grapefruit juice and a splash of soda

Starters

$9.95
Fried Shrimp

Sustainably raised Argentine red shrimp, fried golden brown and served with chipotle mayonnaise for dipping.

$8.95
Tuscan Bruschetta

Crusty sliced Italian bread topped with basil, extra virgin olive oil, chopped tomatoes, garlic and fresh mozzarella cheese.

$7.95
Quesadilla

Jack and cheddar cheese, chopped mild green chilies in a pan grilled flour tortilla. Served with sour cream, guacamole.

$9.95
Wings

A dozen of our crispy, tasty chicken wings with Classic Sweet BBQ sauce, Hot Buffalo Sauce and Scorching Hot Habanero

$8.95
Ultimate Nacho Platter

House made corn tortilla chips, melted cheddar-Jack cheese, mild Anaheim chile salsa, refried beans, guacamole & sour cream

$10
Stuffed Clams

Three large stuffies with chopped clams, medium spiced chouriço Portuguese sausage, chopped bacon, onions, pepper.

Main Plates

$17.95
Fat Tuesday Salad

New Orleans style hot sliced Cajun chicken breast with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers and hard-cooked eggs with warm spicy honey.

$25.95
Braised Boneless Beef Ribs

Braised low and slow, resulting in meat that is deeply flavored, sublimely succulent and tender as can be imagined.

$15.95
Jambalaya

Shrimp, chicken, andouille sausage, rice and traditional jambalaya vegetables and spices. Garnished with sweet red and yellow pepper.

$12.95
Barbecued Chicken Biryani

Chicken tikka, tossed with basmati rice, fried onions and coriander, accompanied by a vegetable sauce.Served with curd.

$25.95
King prawn Biriyani

Off the shell marinated king prawns, cooked with basmati rice, fried onions and coriander, accompanied by a vegetable sauce.

$14.95
Veg Biriyani

This biriyani is cooked with curd, beans, carrot, potato, almond paste,dry fruits,and green chilies,and has a rich flavor.

Tuesday Only!

Albondigas Soup

A steaming cup or bowl of Mexican meatball & vegetable soup garnished with crispy tortilla strips and fresh cheddar-Jack cheese. If you like Mexican food try this!
